nodes.name: completeLoan

completeLoan(string).details: completeLoan is called by the originator to pay off a loan in its entirety     NB: It is worth considering implementing an incremental payoff method

params.loanIdentifier: The server-side loan identifier, created at point of loan match

createLoan(address,uint256,string).details: Creates a new loan & token against a loanIdentifier.     This is called by the lender from the platform, with the function values     determined from the loan matching engine.

params.loanIdentifier: The server-side loan identifier, created at point of loan match
params.originator: The originator of the loan, who will receive the funds

creationFeeBasisPoints().details: Public accessor for the current fee in basis points

getLoanTokenIds(string).details: Changes the fee rate for loan creation

params.loanIdentifier: The server-side loan identifier, created at point of loan match

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * > Note: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFeeRate(uint256).details: Changes the fee rate for loan creation

params.newCreationFeeBasisPoints: The new fee, in basis points

token().details: Public accessor for the token address

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
